description: The Ankle Deck Boot collection has been crafted specifically for Off-Shore anglers. Anglers are athletes, and like any athlete they need the best footwear to help them perform at a high level. We’ve created a lightweight design with the same slip-resistant Chevron outsole found in our Legacy boots. The performance ankle deck boot is the perfect boot for any on the water athlete looking for protection with slip-on-and-go styling. This boot is constructed with hand-layed rubber, therefore it's not a commercial grade boot.
name: Xtratuf 6" Ankle Deck Boot - Mens
